ygData.subject: Re: Dark Awakening/Discovery
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Just make her run to the spaceport, since they re offplanet. Bic: Melchana: That means foe, then, does it Bel? Belthassan: I m afraid so, Melchana.

OOC: Just make her run to the spaceport, since they're offplanet.

Bic:

Melchana: That means foe, then, does it Bel?

Belthassan: I'm afraid so, Melchana. Gesper, come closer and tranform.

The monkey bot transformed and came closer to the other two prophets.

Gesper: So much for only one bot? Really?

Belthassan: Seems that nothing will convince her. Besides, her
processor is too old to be worthy of a Tripredacus. Maybe then, she'll
be a fight.

The three nodded and started concentrating. They started glowing in a
strange an eerie way. The orange of Melchana, the purple of Gesper and
the crimson of Belthassan seemed to merge where they all met until it
became a single and overwhelming light...

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 12/27/02 2:43:47 PM Central Standard Time, 
> wingedwarrior41@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > Belthassan: I told you once already that no one can or will give you
> > your former mode. If you want to find it, you'll have to find a way by
> > yourself. As for your job as a dignitary... there are no other groups
> > other than the Tripredacus here. We'll have to see your role over.
> > Questions?
> > 
> 
> Her optics narrowed. This one was starting to annoy her greatly. A
throaty 
> growl, "I shall not be another's pawn." She turned around. "Very
well. Then 
> leave me in peace." As she moved away from the group. 
> 
> 
> OOC: Who else is on the planet? & how can I get her to the Predacons?
